name: @dxworks/voyenv
description: A cli utility to create voyager releases
author: Mario Rivis <mario.rivis@gmail.com>

scripts.start:install: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/app/index.ts voyenv install
scripts.start:instrument: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/app/index.ts voyenv instrument
scripts.create: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy-files
scripts.local: npm run build && npm i --force && npx voyenv --help
